item.title: Zed Reads 001
item.description: This is an attempt to catalogue and journal most of what I’m trying to read. It is an exercise in articulation, and (hopefully) quick writing and quick reading. Tech Bitcoin â€” The Internet of Money | Startup Boy Great primer on what the Bitcoin is. It comes down to this: the Bitcoin is the digital equivalent of a physical coin. It’s mined by time and computing labour, and each coin is unique because built into every digital wallet is a database of sorts that tracks every single transaction, making sure that no bit coin can be spent twice over.
